BlackRuseMod:Uniform.NAME: Uniform
BlackRuseMod:Uniform.FLAVOR: It helps in keeping dirty stuff away as well as in carrying weapons.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, obtain #b6 #yblackrusemod:Knives.

BlackRuseMod:Broom.NAME: Broom
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b10 cards you manually discard, gain [B] .

BlackRuseMod:KneeBrace.NAME: Knee Brace
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b3 #yBlock for each #yblackrusemod:Shift effect you trigger.

BlackRuseMod:PocketWatch.NAME: Pocket Watch
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust a card, draw a card.

BlackRuseMod:StoneMask.NAME: Stone Mask
BlackRuseMod:StoneMask.FLAVOR: You feel a sudden impulse to reject your humanity.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you kill a non-minion enemy, heal for #b2 HP and gain #b1 permanent Max HP.

BlackRuseMod:MysterySword.NAME: Mystery Sword
BlackRuseMod:MysterySword.FLAVOR: Found in the depths. Users must sacrifice themselves to wield this sword.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [B] at the start of each turn. The first #ySkill you play each turn has #yblackrusemod:Backlash.

BlackRuseMod:PaperSwan.NAME: Paper Swan
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yblackrusemod:Blight, you have a #b50% chance to apply an additional #b1 #yblackrusemod:Blight.

BlackRuseMod:SplendidAttire.NAME: Splendid Attire
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rUniform. At the start of each combat, obtain #b12 #yblackrusemod:Knives, obtain #b3 #yblackrusemod:Satellites, and gain #b1 #yblackrusemod:Elegance.

BlackRuseMod:OldScarf.NAME: Old Scarf
BlackRuseMod:OldScarf.FLAVOR: It is said that this is a family heirloom.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yupgrade all #yblackrusemod:Vision cards in your deck for the rest of combat.

BlackRuseMod:Pan.NAME: Pan
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b2 #yblackrusemod:Blight to ALL enemies.

BlackRuseMod:RomanBracelet.NAME: Roman Bracelet
BlackRuseMod:RomanBracelet.FLAVOR: Only a few people may release its true potential.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, shuffle #b2 #yTemporal #yEssence into your draw pile.
